memberdef.name: Color565

briefdescription.para: Given 8-bit red, green and blue values, return a 'packed' 16-bit color value in '565' RGB format (5 bits red, 6 bits green, 5 bits blue). This is just a mathematical operation, no hardware is touched.

detaileddescription.para: A driver implementation for the ILI9341
